FuncDef: This command enables startup-wait-time during which each peer waits after the initialization process before assuming the active role for the prefix designated as local or access-driven. This is to avoid transient issues during the initialization process.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the minute parameter of the startup wait time feature. Values-1 to 10.
Specifies the seconds parameter of the startup wait time feature. Values-1 to 59.
